body.p: To go further: You are not alone!
GLPI is a community project. Its strength is its powerful community in which you can rely to carry out your project.
You will find below the list of resources and discussion forums that you can use to go further.

section.title: Catalog of plugins (plugins) for GLPI
section.p: The catalog of plugins (plugins) to add functionality GLPI is easily available here . You'll find all the available plugins for GLPI classified by topic and evaluated by users of GLPI.

section.title: Documentation and wiki
section.p: In addition to this documentation, a wiki providing additional information is visible at this address: . Feel free to add your tips and tricks.

section.title: Forum
section.p: The forum is a place for community outreach. Ask your questions about this space, taking care to respect the rules of operation that its own. Then you can request the advice, opinion, and support of other users. Remember to do the same later with new beginners to share your experience.
All mailing lists are visible at this address:

section.title: Mailing lists
section.p: L'ensembles des listes de discussions sont visibles Ã cette adresse :
The list of users: This list is for questions about the use or installation of GLPI. This is the list that you will more likely to get help.

The developers list: This list of work is intended for discussion on programming and development of GLPI. If you want to report a bug, it is preferable to use the forum or this development list and your return will be considered by the team developing.

section.title: GLPI project partners
section.p: The increasing demand for services around the GLPI project has given birth has a network of partners. These partners are able to you provide services with high added value and support the GLPI deployment you need. As an end user, you are assured of close collaboration between the GLPI project and its partners and you support the project since each partner is committed to contribute actively to the GLPI project.
A list of GLPI partner companies is available on the project site :
